thread.title: Colby Rasmus boasts insane, thick beard at Rays' spring training.
thread.title_full: Colby Rasmus boasts insane, thick beard at Rays' spring training.

author: Dan Sostek (daniel.sostek@performgroup.com)
title: Colby Rasmus boasts insane, thick beard at Rays' spring training.
text:
February 22, 2017 1:10pm EST February 22, 2017 1:10pm EST There are good beards, there are bad beards, and then there's the beard that Rays outfielder Colby Rasmus is boasting at spring training. Colby Rasmus (Getty Images) 
Updated at 1:10 p.m. ET 
Updated at 1:10 p.m. ET 
There are good beards, there are bad beards, and then there's the beard that Rays outfielder Colby Rasmus is boasting at spring training. 
The veteran outfielder, who signed with the Rays this offseason, is sporting a thick, long beard with no mustache â€” facial hair that would make Abraham Lincoln jealous.
